headline: Stocks Close at Record as Alphabet Fuels AI Hopes: Markets Wrap
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Stocks closed at all-time highs as Alphabet Inc.’s results showed solid demand for artificial intelligence, bolstering confidence in the technology that has powered the bull market. headline: Chase and Southwest Airlines® Introduce New Benefits on Southwest Rapid Rewards® Credit Cards
summary: WILMINGTON, Del. & DALLAS, July 24, 2025--Today, Chase and Southwest Airlines Co. launch new and enhanced benefits on the Southwest Rapid Rewards® Credit Cards from Chase. The Cards’ benefits and new earn categories now make everyday spending and flying with Southwest Airlines even more rewarding and reflect the airline’s new Customer experience.

headline: Defiance Launches JPX: The First 2X Leveraged ETF on JPM (JP Morgan)
summary: Defiance Launches JPX: The First 2X Leveraged ETF on JPM (JP Morgan) JPX seeks to deliver daily investment results, before fees and expenses, of 200% of the daily performance of JPMorgan Chase & Co.
